function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overrepresentation of immigrants among inpatients in OECD countries due to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased strain on healthcare resources and potential for higher transmission rates within immigrant communities","Mitigation":"Targeted outreach and education, improved access to healthcare, and culturally sensitive public health interventions","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, and digital health platforms","People":"Immigrants, healthcare providers, public health agencies","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Higher risk of critical care and ICU admission for migrants due to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased demand for ICU resources and potential for higher mortality rates among migrant populations","Mitigation":"Enhanced access to preventive care, improved vaccination campaigns, and culturally sensitive healthcare services","Technologies":"Medical monitoring devices, vaccination management systems, and telehealth services","People":"Migrant populations, healthcare providers, public health agencies","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Increased overrepresentation of immigrants among inpatients during the second wave of the pandemic","Impact":"Exacerbation of healthcare disparities and higher burden on healthcare infrastructure","Mitigation":"Improved testing accessibility, targeted public health messaging, and community-based support programs","Technologies":"Rapid testing technologies, contact tracing apps, and health communication platforms","People":"Immigrants, public health agencies, healthcare providers","Owner":"Public health agencies, community organizations"}]}
